sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
SODOM, formerly a town of Paleſtine in Aſia, famous in Scripture for the wickedneſs of its inhabitants, and their deſtruction by fire from heaven on account of-
that wickedneſs. The place where it ſtood is now covered by the waters of the Dead Sea, or the Lake Asphaltites. See Asphaltites.
